title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are immediately applied without confirmation or warning.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: When a working set is removed, the user should be prompted with a confirmation dialog before the changes are applied.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. 2. Remove the working set and observe that the package view is immediately updated without any confirmation.
